name: Introvert: A Teenager Simulator
description: I am Faris, one of the Euphoric Brothers. Addicted to overthinking, lo-fi, and making video games, I decided to merge all three hobbies into one project, thus, Introvert: A Teenager Simulator was born. I have developed this game completely by myself except for some audio, songs and the voice acting. Oh, and I am also 19 and a first-year university student. After releasing a lot of failed commercial games, I realized that I don’t care about money and that what I really want is to create my own universe and community :)
